preparation.raw_text:
1. Begin by measuring out 1.5 g of copper powder. 
 2. Measure 10.5 g of nickel powder. 
 3. Measure 20 g of scandium powder. 
 4. Combine all measured powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 5. Use a stainless steel spatula to mix thoroughly for at least 5 minutes to ensure uniform distribution of the metals.
